org.jclouds.http

Class Uris.UriBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jclouds.http.Uris.UriBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Uris

    public static final class Uris.UriBuilder
extends Object
    Mutable URI builder that can be in level 1 RFC6570 template form. ex. 
      https://api.github.com/repos/{user}
